angel.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a spirit who is God’s servant in heaven, and who is often shown as a person dressed in white with wings
angel.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone who is very kind, very good, or very beautiful
angel.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: That little girl of theirs is an angel.
Sam is no angel (=often behaves badly).
angel.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: used when asking someone to help you or when thanking someone for helping you
angel.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Thanks for mailing those letters, you’re an angel.
Be an angel and get me my glasses, will you?
angel.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: someone who gives new businesses money, often in exchange for a share of the company
